meanings.definition: A person or thing that leans.
meanings.sent1: The tree in the park is a leaner, always swaying in the wind.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the leaner against the wall, waiting for someone to pick it up.
meanings.sent3: The leaner lamp post seemed to be whispering secrets to the passersby.
meanings.sent4: The old building stood like a leaner, barely holding itself up.
meanings.sent5: The leaner in the group always seemed to have a different perspective on things.

meanings.definition: A student who is enrolled in a less advanced class than usual.
meanings.sent1: The leaner in the classroom struggled with the new concepts.
meanings.sent2: She decided to be a leaner this semester to focus on her basics.
meanings.sent3: The leaner in the group always had a unique way of looking at things.
meanings.sent4: Being a leaner in math class made him work harder to catch up.
meanings.sent5: The leaner found comfort in the slower pace of the class.

meanings.definition: A type of meat with less fat content.
meanings.sent1: She preferred leaner cuts of meat for a healthier diet.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for leaner beef to reduce the overall fat content.
meanings.sent3: The leaner meat option surprised him with its tenderness and flavor.
meanings.sent4: Choosing leaner meats helped her achieve her fitness goals.
meanings.sent5: The leaner meat was a hit at the family barbecue, everyone loved it.
